Ask HN: What's the simplest way to store email collected from a landing page?
text:

Managed DBs & VPS seem excessive for this simple case. What's my best option?

Ask HN: Good jobs for those who like Computer Science but dislike Engineering?
text: Have always been good at programming and dealing with theoretical concepts... But, when it comes to wiring different technologies together, testing, dealing with deployments, etc. my curiosity just disappears... Any suggestions for reliable career paths for those who are smart and can think algorithmically, but who don't have the natural tendency to build or "hack" things together?

Ask HN: Why do we need so many package managers?
text:

Am I the only frustrated by this problem?
